name: Quantum Dice
description:
Quantum Dice

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A simple dice game with Quantum Dice! Defeat your opponent by manipulating the dice with quantum physics.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play

You can remove your opponent's Dice by selecting it then a Dice of yours with greater value. You can even use more Dice if the sum of their values is greater.

QuantumDice go to superposition if they are not visible and get a new value when they become visible again. In the shady hidden area your opponent can't see them so try blinking.

QuantumDice can have quantum entanglement between them. The value of an entangled dice is the value on the opposite side of it's pair's value.

Click on an ActionDice to make a special action. Try them all out! Other than not having a value, they behave as other Dice.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours. Everything (design, programming, graphics, audio) done by Dániel Ambrits (@DanielAmbrits).

Tools: Unity, Blender, ChipTone, LMMS with FMetal VSTs
